alert.note: Alert for Duval; Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 8:54PM CDT until April 05 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: The National Weather Service in Corpus Christi has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Duval County in south central Texas... Southeastern Webb County in south central Texas... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 854 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Thompsonville, or 16 miles southwest of Hebbronville, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Bruni and Realitos. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
